scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Letters from presidents to A.B. Happy Chandler were removed from their original files and placed in the V.I.P. Correspondence file. They are arranged chronologically by president. The V.I.P. Correspondence File contains letters to Chandler from: Roosevelt, Franklin D., Truman, Harry S., Eisenhower, Dwight D., Kennedy, John F., Nixon, Richard M.
